hanzi-su-wiki:
華

Значения

Яркий, привлекательный; цветок; Китай

Мнемоника

Цветок травы 艹 не тянется вверх, но 垂 вниз.

Варианты

华, 蕐

сокр. для Китая; великолепный; великолепный; цветочный

huā

rtega_mnemonic:
華華RS
华华		flowery, illustrious, splendid, prosperous, China
  • RS. flower 艹 from 垂 hanging branches
  • ⓢ many 十 changing 化 appearances: splendid flower
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 华)
Pictophonetic: 艹 indicates the sound; 十 (ten) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
華盛頓 [ huá shèng dùn ]: Washington (name); George Washington (1732-1799), first US president; Washington, US State; Washington, D.C. (US federal capital)
華人 [ huá rén ]: ethnic Chinese person or people
華僑 [ huá qiáo ]: overseas Chinese; (in a restricted sense) Chinese emigrant who still retains Chinese nationality; Classifiers: 个
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • ⿻ Overlaid
      • 十 [ shí ] ten, tenth; complete; perfect
heisig_chinese_memo: The Queen of England taking a walk round a village: 'Excuse me, I couldn't help noticing the splendor of the flowers in your garden. Simply splendid. Ten out of ten.' The villager gruffly replies: 'No it 'aint. It's all muck. An' I'm gonna cut it all down and sell it to the farmer for silage (compacted grass used as animal feeder).
Keyword_KANJIDIC: splendor, flower, petal, shine, luster, ostentatious, showy, gay, gorgeous
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: Великолепие, цветок, лепесток, блеск, блеск, показной, эффектный, веселый, великолепный
koohiiStory1: The Queen of England taking a walk round a village: ´Excuse me, I couldn´t help noticing the splendour of the flowers in your garden. Simply splendid. Ten out of ten.´ The villager gruffly replies: ´No it ´aint. It´s all muck. An´ I´m gonna cut it all down and sell it to the farmer for silage.´.
koohiiStory2: (I'm substituting greenhouse for silage. It is also full of all types of plants, and the shape resembles the windows that cover the building to let in the light.) See the splendor of the roses filling the greenhouse, beauty atop a stem of needles (thorns).
jp_example_words:
華奢(かしゃ): luxury, pomp, delicate, slender, gorgeous
華美(かび): pomp, splendor, gaudiness
華々しい(はなばなしい): brilliant, magnificent, spectacular
華やか(はなやか): gay, showy, brilliant, gorgeous, florid
豪華(ごうか): wonderful, gorgeous, splendor, pomp, extravagance
jp_readingExamples: 華美 (かび), 繁華 (はんか), 栄華 (えいが), 華 (はな)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Flowers growing out of a rice paddy into the shape of a cross are really showy flowers.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture these showy flowers growing straight up and out of the middle of the rice paddy, into the shape of a giant cross.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: These flowers are too showy. You hate them. You hate these showy flowers so much you run them over with your car (か)!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine how the car feels as you ram into the showy flowers. The petals explode and rain everywhere. You turn on your windshield wipers to push them away.
Ru_Meaning: splendor, flower, petal, shine, luster, ostentatious, showy, gay, gorgeous

    • warodai

  • расцвет, процветание, слава

    • warodai
Ru_trainchinese:
huá: (сущ/прил) Китай, китайский; время, расцвет молодости; (метео) корона; прекрасный, великолепный; процветающий; экстравагантный, вычурный
huà: (графема) название горы; Хуа (китайская фамилия)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the hanging (垂) grass (艹) is Chinese
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: An ability of great splendor would be to be able to transform something into ten of that thing
humanum_full_description_en:
" China " is " flower ancient word" of the full bloom of flowers shaped like inscriptions, as the next leaf ( " to " shape), " in " for the sound character. "The Book of Songs. Zhou Nan. "Taoyao": "Taozhiyao, burns its flowers."

It is said that it is like a bud (Gao Hongjin), but the inscription is not like a flower bud. Bronze inscriptions are used as place names, national names, names of people, etc. Lu Gonghua Zhong: "Yuan Gonghua chooses Jue Jijin."

" Hua " Xiaozhu is composed of " 𦻏 ", " 𠌶 " and "华" (𦻏) have the same pronunciation and meaning, and the ancient version of the word is mistakenly divided into two. "Said Wen": "𠌶, 艸木华也. From 𠂹 lose sound. All 𠌶 belongs to from 𠌶. 荂, 𠌶 or from 艸 from boast." "Said Wen": "Hua, Rong Ye. From 艸 from 𠌶 All those who belong to Hua are from Hua." The meaning of "Rong Ye" is derived from the blooming of flowers.
humanum_short_description_en: "華" is an ancient word for " flower ". The upper part of the inscription resembles a flower in full bloom, and the lower part resembles a stem and leaf (" Yu " shape). " Yu " is a sound symbol. The original meaning is flowers.
humanum_full_description:
「華」是「花」的古字，金文上象花朵盛放之形，下象莖葉(「于」形)，「于」為聲符。《詩經．周南．桃夭》：「桃之夭夭，灼灼其華。」

　　一說上象蓓蕾(高鴻縉)，然而金文構形並不象花苞。金文用作地名、國族名、人名等。邾公華鐘：「鼄公華擇厥吉金」。

　　「華」小篆作「𦻏」，「𠌶」、「華」(𦻏)音義皆同，古本一字，《說文》誤分為二。《說文》：「𠌶，艸木華也。从𠂹亏聲。凡𠌶之屬皆从𠌶。荂，𠌶或从艸从夸。」《說文》：「華，榮也。从艸从𠌶。凡華之屬皆从華。」「榮也」一義是由花朵盛放引申而來。
humanum_short_description: 「華」是「花」的古字，金文上象花朵盛放之形，下象莖葉(「于」形)，「于」為聲符。本義是花朵。

①美麗而有光彩的：華麗。華豔。華彩。華貴。華章。華表(亦稱“桓表”)。華蓋。
②精英：精華。含英咀華。
③開花：華而不實。春華秋實。
④繁盛：繁華。榮華富貴。
⑤奢侈：浮華。奢華。
⑥指中國或漢族：華夏。中華。華裔。華胄(ａ．華夏的後裔；b．貴族的後裔)。華工。
⑦敬辭，用於跟對方有關的事物：華翰(稱人書信)。華誕(稱人生日)。華居(稱人住宅)。
⑧頭髮花白：華髮。華顛(指年老)。

華僑 [ huá qiáo ]: overseas Chinese; (in a restricted sense) Chinese emigrant who still retains Chinese nationality; Classifiers: 个

華奢(かしゃ): luxury, pomp, delicate, slender, gorgeous
華美(かび): pomp, splendor, gaudiness
華々しい(はなばなしい): brilliant, magnificent, spectacular
華やか(はなやか): gay, showy, brilliant, gorgeous, florid

「 華 」是「 花 」的古字，金文上象花朵盛放之形，下象莖葉(「 于 」形)，「 于 」為聲符。《詩經．周南．桃夭》：「桃之夭夭，灼灼其華。」 一說上象蓓蕾(高鴻縉)，然而金文構形並不象花苞。金文用作地名、國族名、人名等。邾公華鐘：「鼄公華擇厥吉金」。 「 華 」小篆作「 𦻏 」，「 𠌶 」、「 華 」(𦻏)音義皆同，古本一字，《說文》誤分為二。《說文》：「𠌶，艸木華也。从𠂹亏聲。凡𠌶之屬皆从𠌶。荂，𠌶或从艸从夸。」《說文》：「華，榮也。从艸从𠌶。凡華之屬皆从華。」「榮也」一義是由花朵盛放引申而來。
" China" is " flower ancient word" of the full bloom of flowers shaped like inscriptions, as the next leaf ( " to" shape), " in" for the sound character. "The Book of Songs. Zhou Nan. "Taoyao": "Taozhiyao, burns its flowers." It is said that it is like a bud (Gao Hongjin), but the inscription is not like a flower bud. Bronze inscriptions are used as place names, national names, names of people, etc. Lu Gonghua Zhong: "Yuan Gonghua chooses Jue Jijin." " Hua" Xiaozhu is composed of" 𦻏", " 𠌶" and " 华" (𦻏) have the same pronunciation and meaning, and the ancient version of the word is mistakenly divided into two. "Said Wen": "𠌶, 艸木华也. From 𠂹 lose sound. All 𠌶 belongs to from 𠌶. 荂, 𠌶 or from 艸 from boast." "Said Wen": "Hua, Rong Ye. From 艸 from 𠌶 All those who belong to Hua are from Hua." The meaning of "Rong Ye" is derived from the blooming of flowers.

華字的基本解释

華
huá

華
huà

華
huā
均见“华”。

華字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huā］
［《廣韻》呼瓜切，平麻，曉。］
“华1”的繁体字。亦作“蕐1”。
(1)花。
(2)剖开。
[②]［huá］
［《廣韻》户花切，平麻，匣。］
“华2”的繁体字。亦作“蕐2”。
(1)开花。
(2)果实。
(3)出现在太阳或月亮周围的光环。由光线通过云中的小水滴或冰粒时发生衍射而形成。
(4)光采；光辉。
(5)华美；有文采。
(6)彩色的。特指雕绘或装饰。
(7)时光。
(8)年轻；年少。
(9)我国古称华夏，今称中华。省称“華”。
(10)汉语。
(11)荣华；光耀。
(12)浮华。
(13)精华。
(14)（头发）花白。
(15)赤色。
(16)称美之词。通常用于跟对方有关的事物。
(17)通“譁”。喧哗。
[③]［huà］
［《廣韻》胡化切，去禡，匣。］
“华3”的繁体字。亦作“蕐3”。
(1)山名。参见“華3山”。
(2)姓。春秋宋有华元。
[④]［kuā］
［《集韻》空媧切，

華字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　華； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1039第14
〔古文〕䔢【唐韻】戸花切【集韻】胡瓜切，?音划。【書·舜典】重華協于帝。【傳】華謂文德。　又【禮·檀弓】華而睆。【疏】凡繪畫，五色必有光華，故曰華畫也。　又【廣韻】草盛也。　又粉也。【曹植·洛神賦】鉛華弗御。　又髮白也。【後漢·陳蕃傳】蹇諤之操，華首彌固。　又華林，園名。【魏志】芳林園卽今華林園。　又地名。【戰國策】說趙王于華屋之下。【史記·秦本紀註】華陽，地名。【吳志·孫皓傳】皓舉大衆出華里。　又【水經注】河水東南徑華池。　又華表。【古今註】堯設誹謗木，今之華表。　又星名。【晉書·天文志】大帝九星曰華蓋。　又【韻會】胡化切，音話。【書·禹貢】至于太華。【爾雅·釋山】華山，爲西嶽。　又姓。【潛夫論】華氏子，姓也。【通志·氏族略】宋戴公子者，食采于華，因氏焉。　又【司馬相如·上林賦】華楓枰櫨。【註】華皮可以爲索。　又【集韻】呼瓜切，音譁。【禮·曲禮】爲國君者華之。【註】華，中裂之，不四拆也。【爾雅·釋木】瓜曰華之。　又與花同。【爾雅·釋草】華，荂

["Guangyun" household flower cut, flat hemp, box. ]
Traditional characters for "华2". Also known as "蕐2".
(1) Flowering.
(2) Fruit.
(3) The halo that appears around the sun or moon. It is formed by diffraction when light passes through small water droplets or ice particles in the cloud.
(4) Brilliant; brilliant.
(5) Gorgeous; literary talent.
(6) Colored. Especially refers to carving or decoration.
(7) Time.
(8) Young; young.
(9) Our country was called Huaxia in ancient times, and China today. The province is called "Hua".
(10) Chinese.
(11) Ronghua; Glory.
(12) Flashy.
(13) Essence.
(14) (Hair) Gray.
(15) Red.
(16) The word of beauty. Usually used for things related to the other party.
(17) Through "Wow". Noisy.
[③] [huà]
["Guangyun" Hu Huaqie, go to 禡, box. ]
Traditional characters for "华3". Also known as "蕐3".
(1) The name of the mountain. See "Hua 3 Mountains".
(2) Last name. There is Huayuan in the Spring and Autumn Songs.

Name meaning
Same as "Hua".
huá, huā, huà
вм. 华
Radicals: 艹, 田, 十  (flowers, rice-paddy, cross)
Meaning Mnemonic
Flowers growing out of a rice paddy into the shape of a cross are really showy flowers.
Picture these showy flowers growing straight up and out of the middle of the rice paddy, into the shape of a giant cross.
Reading Mnemonic
These flowers are too showy. You hate them. You hate these showy flowers so much you run them over with your car (か)!
Imagine how the car feels as you ram into the showy flowers. The petals explode and rain everywhere. You turn on your windshield wipers to push them away.
